author: 1CanadianGirl
title: Excellent stay at Hyatt Herald Square -
text: First of all I'd like to thank the Hyatt manager and front desk staff who made our weekend celebration even more memorable. They went above and beyond to make us feel special. We received a lovely and comfortable king room with an Empire State Building view. It was an excellent stay in a central location and we would recommend staying here.
